author: Jojo#7791
install_msg:
This cog is designed for having collectable pets (I kinda got this idea from the config documentation so thanks Red :D)
If you have any questions about this cog please contact Jojo on discord (Jojo#7791) or join the support server <https://discord.gg/JmCFyq7>
description: This cog allows you to become an owner of virtual pets. This cog uses the Bank module so you might want to have the economy cog loaded
end_user_data_statement: This cog doesn't store any data about anyone :D
